○ Scope Of Work Cl2.1 item m.

PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - All delivered materials and procured items conforms to project specification and AFC drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per Drawings and Specifications
RELEVANT SECTION - MRTS04 Table A.1, No. 1.1 Earth Fill Material and Table 14.2.2.
1.6 - Inspection Measuring and Test Equipment (IMTE) Registers
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Supply of all calibration certificates to the Engineer including but not limited to: Survey equipment
RELEVANT SECTION - UGL 3200-0706- PLN-001 QMP Section 9.8
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Registered Surveyor to set out pad with pegs and markers.
○ Check surveyor marks against known structures, such as boundaries, fences , and more or control points.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Drawing provided showing marked out areas and exclusion zones.
RELEVANT SECTION -  Drawing Number: 0706-C-DRG-0002 General Notes G8.
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - Survey complies with checks and AFC drawings.
2.2 - Subgrade: In location of existing surface- hardstand material: Tyne existing surface
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Tyne surface and remove any unsuitable material i.e., construction debris, vegetation etc.
○ Moisture conditioned as required and compact to 98% SMDD.
○ Proof Roll using either 7,000 litre single rear axle or 10,000 litre double rear axle water tanker.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Pad free of all unwanted materials
○ Stockpile is not to exceed 2m and a slope of 1V:3H.
RELEVANT SECTION - Drawing Number: 0706-C-DRG-0011 Notes Item 2, 3 & 5.
2.3 - Subgrade: In location where NO existing hardstand material – strip surface
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Strip surface to 150mm depth and remove any unsuitable material i.e., construction debris, vegetation etc.
○ Moisture conditioned as required and compact 200mm minimum depth to 98% SMDD to achieve minimum CBR 5%.
○ Proof Roll using either 7,000 litre single rear axle or 10,000 litre double rear axle water tanker.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Pad free of all unwanted materials.
○ Soil compacted to 98% SMDD, No perceptible deformation.
RELEVANT SECTION - Drawing Number: 0706-C-DRG-0011 Notes Item 2, 3 & 5.
2.4 - Presence of contaminated soil or heritage items
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - If contaminated soil or heritage items are found during excavation, works are to stop immediately.
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - UGL team to document as per 3200-0706-PLN-005 CEMP
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Survey finish surface of subgrade.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Survey Conformance Report for finish surface uniformity.
○ Maximum ±20mm in 3m straight edge at any direction.
RELEVANT SECTION - Drawing Number: 0706-C-DRG-0011 Notes Item 2, 3 & 5.
○ Drawing 0706-C- DRG-0002 Gen. Notes E5 & P1.
○ Survey Conformance Report for finish surface uniformity
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Tie-in new select fill material to existing pad through series of benching.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Platform bench dimension 200mm vertical steps and 600mm wide.
RELEVANT SECTION - Drawing number 0706-C-DRG-0011 Typical Platform Tie-In detail
2.7 - Select Fill Class A1 Select Fill Material CBR 15%
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Place maximum 200mm thick loose material and compact in layers.
○ Trim final surface level for uniformity.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Fill compacted to 98% SMDD.
○ Maximum ±10mm in 3m straight edge at any direction.
RELEVANT SECTION - Drawing TC18368- C-DRG-0001 Earthworks Notes E9.
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - Survey Conformance Report for finish surface uniformity.
○ NATA test report for Density and OMC
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Proof roll using either 7,000 litre single rear axle or 10,000 litre tandem rear axle water tanker
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - No perceptible surface deformation
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Sub-contractor to provide survey records to Engineer for review and acceptance. Deviations or changes to AFC Design shall be highlighted to Engineer.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Provision of CAD file of Works.
RELEVANT SECTION - UGL 3200-0706- PLN-001 QMP Section 11.1.1
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Walkdown and inspection of works and development of punch list with Engineer and or Supervisor.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Punchlist closed in a timely manner.
RELEVANT SECTION - UGL 3200-0706- PLN-001 QMP Section 9.7
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Any NCRs that have been raised during the progress of the works have been formally closed out and lessons have been captured.
○ Refer to UGL Quality Management Plan.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - NCRs close out in a timely manner.
RELEVANT SECTION - UGL 3200-0706- PLN-001 QMP Section 9.5
VERIFYING DOCUMENT -  NCR Closed, signed off.
